name: Neural Reconstruction Engine
description:
Thanks to advancements in medical and digital technology, you now have the ability to go into your mind and fix the wiring of your brain. This is done through HessLab's groundbreaking new technology, the Neural Reconstruction Engine. Using a VR headset, you can directly connect to your mind, where you can strengthen your mental abilities. 

Connect neurons together in the correct spectrum of color to solve immersive VR puzzles and beat increasingly challenging levels. Solve them as fast as possible while making minimal mistakes to strengthen your mind.

My first VR project and it was extremely fun to make. Designed based on the limitations and prompts from Mini Jam 111: Colors.
